title: Smtp doesnt work on any settings
creator: roger3
content: I have been a user of K9 for years but recently it stopped sending messages and gave smtp errors it downloads messages pop with no issues. I then tried android thunderbird but with same result no success despite settings exactly same as I use on desktop thunderbird.I have tried other android email clients with no problems. Recently changed email provider but have exactly same situation with their email servers. Now also have new phone but the problem still persists with thunderbird.this time i use qr code to setup which meant I could st least get into thunderbird 'previously the rejected smtp setting meant I was locked out of proceeding into thunderbird. I have tried various different smtp settings but none work. Currently getting notifications of smtpresponseparserexception unexpected end of string...
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/127.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36;os:Android 14
